survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee perceptions of mental health support and resources provided by the organization, identifying areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall mental well-being at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for radio buttons.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall mental well-being at work?

Workshops or training on mental health
